note.p: Career: Supernumerary Computer, Royal Observatory, Greenwich (1841-47); Assistant Observer, Adelaide, South Australia (1848-1854); Director, Adelaide Observatory (1855-1906); Postmaster-General, Superintendent of Telegraphs, and Government Astronomer; organized meteorological service and telegraphic system
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1911 vol 85 pp xiii-xvii signed by W H B
References: John G Jenkin, 'The Appointment of W H Bragg, FRS, to the University of Adelaide' in NR 1985-86 vol 40 pp 75-99
